00050 // TFIDFScoreFunction

00055 #ifndef INDRI_TFIDFTERMSCOREFUNCTION_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_TFIDFTERMSCOREFUNCTION_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/TermScoreFunction.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/IndriIndex.hpp"
00060 #include <math.h>
00061 
00062 class TFIDFTermScoreFunction : public TermScoreFunction {
00063 private:
00065   double _inverseDocumentFrequency; 
00067   double _averageDocumentLength;
00068 
00069   double _termWeight;
00070 
00071   // These are BM25 parameters
00072   double _k1;
00073   double _b;
00074 
00075   // The following values are precomputed so that score computation will go faster
00076   double _bOverAvgDocLength;
00077   double _k1TimesOneMinusB;
00078   double _idfTimesK1PlusOne;
00079   double _k1TimesBOverAvgDocLength;
00080   double _termWeightTimesIDFTimesK1;
00081 
00082   void _precomputeConstants() {
00083     _idfTimesK1PlusOne = _inverseDocumentFrequency * ( _k1 + 1 );
00084     _k1TimesOneMinusB = _k1 * (1-_b);
00085     _bOverAvgDocLength = _b / _averageDocumentLength;
00086     _k1TimesBOverAvgDocLength = _k1 * _bOverAvgDocLength;
00087     _termWeightTimesIDFTimesK1 = _termWeight * _inverseDocumentFrequency * _k1;
00088   }
00089 
00090 public:
00091   TFIDFTermScoreFunction( IndriIndex& index, int termID, double termWeight, double k1 = 1, double b = 0.5 ) {
00092     double idfNumerator = index.docCount()+1;
00093     double idfDenominator = 0.5+index.docCount( termID );
00094 
00095     _inverseDocumentFrequency = log( idfNumerator / idfDenominator );
00096     _averageDocumentLength = index.docLengthAvg();
00097     _termWeight = termWeight;
00098 
00099     _k1 = k1;
00100     _b = b;
00101 
00102     _precomputeConstants();
00103   }
00104 
00105   TFIDFTermScoreFunction( double idf, double averageDocumentLength, double k1, double b ) {
00106     _inverseDocumentFrequency = idf;
00107     _averageDocumentLength = averageDocumentLength;
00108 
00109     _k1 = k1;
00110     _b = b;
00111 
00112     _termWeight = queryTermWeight( 1000, 0 );
00113     _precomputeConstants();
00114   }
00115 
00116   double scoreOccurrence( int occurrences, int documentLength ) {
00117     //
00118     // Score function is:
00119     //                                                   K1 * occurrences
00120     // score = termWeight * IDF * ------------------------------------------------------------------
00121     //                             occurrences + K1 * ( (1-B) + B * ( documentLength / avgDocLength) )
00122     //
00123     // Factored for constants:
00124     //                        (termWeight * IDF * K1) * occurrences
00125     // score = ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00126     //          occurrences + (K1 * (1-B)) + (K1 * B * 1/avgDocLength) * documentLength
00127     //
00128 
00129     double numerator = _termWeightTimesIDFTimesK1 * occurrences;
00130     double denominator = occurrences + _k1TimesOneMinusB + _k1TimesBOverAvgDocLength * documentLength;
00131 
00132     return numerator / denominator;
00133   }
00134 
00135   double scoreOkapiOccurrence( int occurrences, int documentLength ) {
00136     double numerator = _idfTimesK1PlusOne * occurrences;
00137     double denominator = occurrences + _k1TimesOneMinusB + _bOverAvgDocLength * documentLength;
00138 
00139     return numerator / denominator;
00140   }
00141 
00142   double maximumScore( int minimumDocumentLength, int maximumOccurrences ) {
00143     return scoreOccurrence( maximumOccurrences, minimumDocumentLength );
00144   }
00145 
00146   double queryTermWeight( double queryK1, double queryB ) {
00147     return ( _inverseDocumentFrequency * queryK1 ) / ( 1 + queryK1 * ( (1-queryB) + queryB * (1/_averageDocumentLength) ) );
00148   }
00149 };
